column3: Fancy meeting you here, adventurer. I trust your exploration is proceeding without incident? As is Krile's work with the proto-aetheryte?
...Fascinating. I did not expect her to make such progress. This “reversing of the flow” intrigues me as well...
Ah, forgive my mutterings. I should thank you for sharing your discoveries with me. I feel as though I am on the verge of an epiphany.
Ever so helpful, aren't you. So eager to please, to set the wrong to right. As befits a hero and liberator...
I really do owe it to you to return the favor. To help with your magicite collection efforts. Besides, I've no need of the stuff any longer.

Ah─how forgetful of me. There was one bit of information I neglected to share with you earlier. The name of the deiform entity, the elder primal that Galuf and the others sought to imprison in this place.
The selfsame name we bestowed upon this isle. An amusing coincidence, is it not? And yet, in retrospect, so very appropriate...
Anyway, I'm afraid that's all I have to share for now. But if the fates conspire to reveal to me any other pearls of wisdom, rest assured you will be the very first to know.
At the center of the confluence of aether you find a shimmering stone─magicite. Upon its removal, the confluence dissipates...
